cpl.readme:
This plugin is meant for widescreen monitors.
It changes the standard 'twostate' (<> / <>) functionality of the Sidebar to a 'tristate' (<> / <> / <>) functionality: # normal tiddler width (default 686px) with a broad Sidebar (showing <>). # small Sidebar (with programmable width; default 30em) and fluid tiddler width (showing <>). # fluid tiddler width without Sidebar (showing <>). <<< ''Note:'' * ''This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/).'' * Sidebar layout (''~ControlPanel > Appearance > Theme Tweaks: Options'') @@color:red;must@@ be set at 'Fixed story, fluid sidebar'
('Fluid story, fixed sidebar' interferes with the Tristate plugin!) * The Sidebar width (default 30em) can be configured in [[Tristate width|$:/plugins/tg/tristate/settings]] (can also be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]], tab 'Tristate'''). <<<
